Module roborally
Package game.round

Class ActivationPhase

java.lang.Object
game.round.Phase
game.round.ActivationPhase
public class ActivationPhase
extends Phase
The Activation Phase is the third phase in the Round. In this class the Programming Cards and GameBoard Tiles are activated.
Author:
janau, sarah, annika, Louis

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  ActivationPhase.RobotDistance
    Class to handle the players robots by y-coordinate and distance from antenna

  • Constructor Details

    • ActivationPhase

      public ActivationPhase()
      starts the ActivationPhase. After each register the method for activating the board tiles ist called. In every register the priority is determined (-> turnCards) and the players cards get activated in priority order.

  • Method Details

    • turnCards

      public void turnCards​(int register)
      At the beginning of each register the cards of each player in the current register is shown. This is already in priority order.

    • activateCards

      public void activateCards​(int playerID)
      This method is called whenever a PlayIt() protocol is received. it is checked if its the given players turn. If yes, the cards is handled.

    • activateControlPoint

      public void activateControlPoint()
      Checkpoint is the final destination of the game and player wins the game as soon as the player has reached all the checkpoints in numerical order. The player gets the checkpoint token. CheckPointReached and GameWon Protocol are sent.

    • handleFinishedRegister

      public void handleFinishedRegister()
      this method starts the next register if the game is not already won or all players are rebooting. If it's already the fifth register the next Phase is called.

    • removeCurrentCards

      public void removeCurrentCards​(int playerID)
      removes the current card of a player that has disconnected from the server.
      Parameters:
      playerID - player who disconnected

    • activateBoard

      public void activateBoard()
      Method that activates the board elements in their right order.

    • handleMove

      public void handleMove​(Player player, Orientation o)
      Handles the movment of one player for one tile in a specific direction. Considers board elements.
      Parameters:
      player - Player that is moved
      o - Orientation player is moved to

    • moveOne

      public void moveOne​(Player player, Orientation orientation)
      Moves the player in a direction. Does not consider board elements. Only called by the handleMove method.
      Parameters:
      player - Player that is moved
      orientation - Orientation player is moved to

    • handleCard

      public void handleCard​(CardType cardType, Player player)

    • replaceDamageCard

      public void replaceDamageCard​(Player player)
      this method checks if the top card of the draw deck is an Again card
      Parameters:
      player - player who has to draw a card

    • handleRecursion

      public void handleRecursion​(Player player)
      This method handles recursion for Again Card with different base cases. If the player plays again card back to back in 2 registers, then in such case the card from the {register-2} is used. Under normal circumstance the effect of immediate previous card is handled.
      Parameters:
      player - current player playing game

    • handleTile

      public void handleTile​(Player player)
      Handles effects of a specific position on the map.(Outside the map? Did the player fall into a pit?)
      Parameters:
      player - Player whose tile must be checked

    • isPositionFree

      public boolean isPositionFree​(int position)
      It checks whether the position is free or not.
      Parameters:
      position - position of tile on board
      Returns:
      true if no robot is on that tile

    • isPositionFree

      public boolean isPositionFree​(Coordinate coordinate)
      It checks whether the position is free or not.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - coordinate of tile on board
      Returns:
      true if no robot is on that tile

    • determinePriority

      public java.util.ArrayList<Player> determinePriority​(Coordinate antenna)
      Determines the priority depending on the antenna and returns a list of players in order of priority.
      Parameters:
      antenna - game antenna
      Returns:
      a list of players in priority order

    • sortByYCoordinate

      public void sortByYCoordinate​(java.util.ArrayList<ActivationPhase.RobotDistance> sameDistance, Coordinate antenna, java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerPriority)
      Sorts the list of players with the same distance to the antenna by the order in which the antenna beam hits them clockwise.
      Parameters:
      sameDistance - ArrayList of robots with the same distance
      antenna - game antenna
      playerPriority - a list of players in priority order

    • sortDistance

      public java.util.ArrayList<ActivationPhase.RobotDistance> sortDistance​(Coordinate antenna)
      Fills the ArrayList sortedDistance with matching objects and sorts them according to their distance to the antenna.
      Parameters:
      antenna - the game antenna
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of players and their robots sorted by their distance to the antenna

    • drawDamage

      public void drawDamage​(Deck damageDeck, Player player, int amount)
      whenever a robot receives damage this method is called to check if there are enough damage cards available and send drawDamage or PickDamage based on this information.
      Parameters:
      damageDeck - Deck from which the damage cards should be drawn
      player - player whose robot received damage
      amount - number of damage cards to draw

    • handleSelectedDamage

      public void handleSelectedDamage​(SelectDamage selectDamage, User user)
      If a selectDamage protocol was received this method tries to draw the cards from the chosen decks. If there are not enough cards PickDamage is sent again
      Parameters:
      selectDamage - received message
      user - user whose robot receives damage

    • allPlayersRebooting

      public boolean allPlayersRebooting()
      Checks if every player is rebooting at the same time.

    • isRebooting

      public boolean isRebooting​(Player player)
      returns if a player is not rebooting
      Parameters:
      player - player to check
      Returns:
      true if player is rebooting

    • activateCheatLaser

      public void activateCheatLaser()
      This is independent of activated board method and used for cheats. #fire activates this method.

    • getCurrentCards

      public java.util.ArrayList<RegisterCard> getCurrentCards()

    • getCurrentRegister

      public int getCurrentRegister()

    • getActivationElements

      public BoardElements getActivationElements()
